title: Roland Finds a Magic Stone
description: Roland and Flint travel together. Explore seaside scenes, raging rivers and the Himalayan Mountains. Discover the power of magic in overcoming unforeseen challenges.Roland has to make a tough decision when his older brother steals Flint. How can Roland defeat his older brother and rescue his friend? Can the united pair change how his older brother sees the world? Will Roland mange to save Flint and help him return to the other magic stones? Large Print Easy To Read
author: Jon Oregon
